definitions: spoil the order or arrangement of a collection of things

examples.text: the papers got mixed up when they slid off her lap
disconnect all the cables, mix them up then try to reconnect them

shortDefinitions: spoil order or arrangement of collection of things

definitions: confuse someone or something with another person or thing

examples.text: I'd got her mixed up with her sister

notes.text: "mix someone or something up", "mix up someone or something"

shortDefinitions: confuse person or thing with another person or thing
